price: يقيناً څوك چې كافر شوي او ظلم يې كړى نو الله به نه بخښنه ورته وكړي او نه به كومه لاره ورته وښايې.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَظَلَمُواْ لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱللَّهُ لِيَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا لِيَهۡدِيَهُمۡ طَرِيقًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū waẓalamū lam yakuni al-lahu liyaghfira lahum walā liyahdiyahum ṭarīqan
